summary: Ghost effect changer that makes ghosts look a little better.
descriptionHtml:
Revamped Ghosts

This mod alters the default appearance of ghosts in Skyrim, I always thought they didn't look scary enough and this mod aims at changing this.

New forms have been created for the shader effects and the vanilla ghosts spells now reference these instead. The eye effect comes from a customisation of the Necro eye glow .nif (white instead of red), these are applied by a simple script in the spell effect to humanoid ghosts but not to animal ghosts.

Warning, this mod will make ghosts much harder to see but you can make them out by their eyes.

Requirements: This is compiled under V1.8, it should be compatible with V1.9

Installation: Merge it with your data folder, NMM users it should happen automatically.

Un-installation: I frown deeply at the removal of mods during a game play due to the potential damage the practice can do to your save file. Having said that the script applies the effect via a spell effect and the potential for damage is minimal. Definitely worth your while to make sure there are no ghosts around if you do remove it.

Conflicts: Mods that try to do the same thing, I have not altered the vanilla actor ghosts entries or the vanilla script applied to them so there should be no problems from that side of things.

Future plans: Release an extra esp that will add various spawn points around Skyrim so you can enjoy a bit more ghost hunting.
